I have to try to find these items separately.  Works fine though otherwise.  I bought it so that I could text more easily than from my old basic tracfone.  Also I like the camera feature.  So often I see something that I want to take a picture of when I don't have my camera.  I studied the features out carefully before buying, and I think I got a good deal through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: G. Itzkowitz
Reviews.Content: So far , so good. Got it for my husband. It works in places where the others didn't before, but it falls apart very easily when he drops it , often, so be aware.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: robzip
Reviews.Content: best tracfone I have ever had. soo easy to text and program. I am so so glad I bought it!

Reviews.Title: LG 530G
Reviews.Author: C. Franks
Reviews.Content: Pros:>Inexpensive>qwerty keyboard>good sound quality on calls>battery seems very good.>triple minutes>receiving calls does not require the long boot time (see cons)Cons:>Powering on takes a very long time (a full 32 seconds to get to the menu screen!). This is why I only give this product 3 stars.>keys are rather small and I don't have huge fingers but you can type without error if you are careful.>could not pair the bluetooth with my other phone to transfer my contacts. I am not sure what the problem there is. Perhaps operator error.>phone was not visible to a caller one day and the phone was at the same location only it had been moved upstairs.

Reviews.Title: Nifty
Reviews.Author: Heidisuz
Reviews.Content: Nice phone!  Wish it had bigger buttons & came with a case ...Takes nice picsGot the LG500 flex cover & it fits good (a few holes in the wrong spots - but not bad & easy to fix)

Reviews.Title: Buttons very smalll
Reviews.Author: Choson
Reviews.Content: Phone is good but the keyboard is very small.  A 4 year old would have a hard time hitting the right buttons on it

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Reviews.Author: Patricia Baldwin
Reviews.Content: Love this phone!  It has great pickup.  Can talk anywhere and call is not dropped.  It is my "smart phone".

Reviews.Title: Happy~!!!
Reviews.Author: Sherie Dearth
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this phone.  It was easy to transfer my number and airtime from my old phone.  No problem adding contact info.  Musch easier to text and receive text.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: JANICE E MOORE
Reviews.Content: this is the 2nd LG530G i've purchased.  the 1st one got wet so i bought another one just like it because it's easy to use, easy texting and it's inexpensive.  the triple minutes are great, too.  i've had pretty good experiences with Tracfone, too.

Reviews.Title: LG530G tracfone
Reviews.Author: Mei Mei Brown
Reviews.Content: There were a few quirks that a person technologically challenged person would require some assistance from a person who is a whiz at this sort of thing.  Works very well and reception is better than my old tracfone, which was the primary reason for purchasing it.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but problems...
Reviews.Author: Scully4ever
Reviews.Content: After a month of telephone calls, Tracfone finally had to send a replacement phone. It STILL doesn't work right. Texts are either not going through or show up 30 minutes later. Time for a Smart phone!

Reviews.Title: easy texting on keyboard..
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hain
Reviews.Content: arrived promptly, phone was easy to set up & enjoy having a keyboard(last Tracfone was touch screen.)  local service is spotty, but phone has strong antenna. recommend this phone for someone who doesn't want/need all the bells&whistles;, and mostly use phone for texting & calls. did research before buying and this phone & 1 year service& 400minutes(tripled) card i purchased also, provides me w/ a new phone, 1 year service and 1200mins. for less than $10/month.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Madan
Reviews.Content: Good Phone from LG. Presented to my daughter and she likes it. It is almost more than a month and no issues. I would recommend this definitely.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Monique Gale-Messina
Reviews.Content: This phone is GREAT.  I bought this phone because it was a track phone and also I could text with it.  The only thing I wish was that I could find a cover for it.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Hiene Junge
Reviews.Content: I had a few issues with tracfone porting my land line number, took over ten days. The Phone works great, only had it in use for one week.

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: Marieb
Reviews.Content: my phone arrived in a timely manner, I love the way it fits into my hand, it's also lightweight,good looking .so far I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Donald R. Janousek
Reviews.Content: Works fine.  Double minutes installed card a real bargain.  Have been using it daily.  Very good features.  Would highly recommend it to others.  A good buy.

Reviews.Title: Syncing to the depths...
Reviews.Author: Jacob Andrew VanAtta
Reviews.Content: I love this new phone; I bought one on Tracfone's network 2 days ago. It's got email access, mobile web... and a useless music player. I can't get this thing to sync to my computer. I've downloaded the LG USB driver, but it's made no difference.Other than that, though, can't say I can complain that much. It sucks down both battery life and minutes, but, based on Tracfone's mobile web system, that's just a fact of life now.I now have a MicroSD card, and I found it easier to drag-and-drop files for transfer to the card by sliding it into a card reader. I haven't found a way to sync the phone directly, but it doesn't matter anymore. I got the music player to work.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Wife loves it.  Online manual is excellent for learning all the functions. Only one issue and that is the back removable plate is very flimsy.  A case should solve that.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: M.F. "mom"
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a phone to keep in touch with my husband while he's at work. I love how cheap it is and and it's better than the Walmart Samsung i had! Nice for texting!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and am overall very pleased with it.  It is easy to use and very clear (voice). It is thin and lightweight.  So far, Tracfone has been a good thing for us.

Reviews.Title: Save money use a Tracfone
Reviews.Author: Michel Henderson
Reviews.Content: So far I'm very happy with my new phone.  I switched to save money from my wireless plan.  Just needed a basic phone.  This one works great and I'm saving well over $250 a year!

Reviews.Title: My wife loves this new phone.
Reviews.Author: G. D. Dickirson
Reviews.Content: This phone replaced my wife's flip phone. She loves it because it is easy to use and she can now text.

Reviews.Title: A Little Phone with a Big Output!
Reviews.Author: Lena Gwendole Ryder "Lena G. Ryder"
Reviews.Content: It is convenient and easy to use.  I can find and note names of friends and family, and write their phone numbersEasy as eating pie!  Have had a few conversations with friends and family using this phone.Love it.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: P. L. Landry
Reviews.Content: replaced old Tracfone and works much better than the old one, better reception and better size and weights for practical use

Reviews.Title: Trackfone is a great value
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I have two, this 530 and an 840 touchscreen.  Thisone is more simple, for my wife who doesn't like touchscreens.

Reviews.Title: Setting Daylight Saving Time??
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: How is the new Daylight Savings Time set? I have spent more time thanI should trying to perform this function!

Reviews.Title: never again will I buy a phone with tracfone
Reviews.Author: jeane ley "the oblate"
Reviews.Content: I will never buy a phone on line without knowledge of how it works...my mistake #1. I did read all about it and the reviews but thought it would work out as I only need a phone for emergencies...Well, the emergency would be over by the time I get the phone on, unlocked and unlocked again and get it to move to contact and to all the other things to get help...My 6 year old phone was a simple goto idea and now this phone is a project to get service.Now, why did I not just return it?Because I thought I just had to get past the learning curve and made the mistake of calling Tracfone to get my1818.6 minutes transferred over to the old phone...I got connected to a person after numerous trial and error numbers and voice only conversations and number crunching...this took 1:12 min...Then the real fun...I could hardly hear person and he did not speak clear English...I told him what I needed (Ihave delt with no problem in past 6 years of buying air time with Tracfone)...he did not understand at first...after entering dozens of codes and giving a ton of info...he TOOK OFF ALL MY MINUTES FROM OLD PHONE AND IT SHUT DOWN...AH, THAT IS GOOD ! NOOOOOOOOOOO because it is not on my new phone...it is not any place...I have spent 2:56 min. more to get to this place...HE SAYS BARE WITH HIM FOR THE MMILLIONTH TIME  what other choice do I have...more code entering , more time, I have done a load of laundry, eaten dinner, watched 4 TV shows while doing this so far...THEN, HE SAYS OH, I WILL CALL YOU BACK IN 20 SEC...I ask on what number and he says he can not tell me and hangs.up...NOW I HAVE ZERO WORKING PHONES OLD OR NEW ONE ...ZERO MINUTES AND AM ZEROED OUT...A call to Amazon...no help but they were sorry..Back to Tracfone...now into 4th hour plus...more long waits at last a person...he was easier to hear and work with...we started putting in codes and codes and more codes and thank you for baring with mes etc...after hour 6 total time he says t "there ...sou should have your minutes back in 48 hours!"NOOOOOOOOOOOO I want them now ..I am elderly ...I may not be around in 48 more hours and I don't want to call back back if it doesn't work...have mercy on me.Ah, he took pity on me and said let me talk to my sup...I figure he will never come back BUT HE DID AND SAID WE CAN GET YOU YOUR MINUTES NOW...They did and I now can use the phone...I unlock it and it loks if you don't hurry ...It is not a fun fone.It is not good service...I like Tracfone service IF I don't need their help...I never, never, never,want to deal with them again!

Reviews.Title: Where is the "Sent" folder?
Reviews.Author: S. L. Bigelow
Reviews.Content: This is the first cell phone I've ever owned that doesn't have a 'sent' folder in the text area. Maybe it's just me, but this is a crucial feature in a phone. I often find myself referring back to sent messages for various reasons. "I sent that message right as I left the house...what time was that?" and I can go look at the time I sent the message. Or..."did I send that to so-and-so by mistake?"...guess what, you can't go back and check, because you have no 'sent' folder. Totally ruins the phone for me. Why leave out such a basic feature?EDIT: Since writing this review, I have discovered that the "outbox" folder works as your "sent" folder. However, there is no folder for texts you want to save, you can only save to the SIM card, and then when you go to look for it...well, good luck finding it.

Reviews.Title: bought for the mp3 player
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: Bought this so I wouldn't have to carry a phone and  an  mp3 player around with me.I am not disappointed in it.

Reviews.Title: Really great phone for $39
Reviews.Author: C. Giglio
Reviews.Content: I'm a tracfone user and this phone is great for texting and calling. I've downloaded the facebook app. It's nothing like a higher end smart phone, but it been great for me.

Reviews.Title: If you need a QWERTY you can feel, this is your phone.
Reviews.Author: suzanne adams
Reviews.Content: As with all 3ple minute deals, you will probably need to buy service time. Unless you talk or text extremely your time will run out first. Still cheap as dirt and a good quality phone.

Reviews.Title: Out of the texting dark ages...
Reviews.Author: grannynanny
Reviews.Content: ...and into the 21st Century!  Tracfone, for me, has been a wonderful mobile carrier, and this new phone will make my life easier.

Reviews.Title: For daughter
Reviews.Author: wendy ireson
Reviews.Content: This seemed the easiest way to give my daughter a cellphone and some responsibility too.  I buy her 60 minutes every 90 days, which is tripled with this phone, if she uses her minuted she has to buy more.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Sheila K. Tirrell
Reviews.Content: I know this phone was on the cheaper side but it does so much clear large reading for phone numbers and everything else.can move around real easy would recommend this phone if you are on a fix income you get a lot for your money

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: buzz66boy
Reviews.Content: Overall a good little phone for what it is.  I am not real thrilled with the keyboard though.  Seem to often hit the wrong keys.  Good thing I am not a big texter!

Reviews.Title: Buyers beware..
Reviews.Author: Kris Engelmeier
Reviews.Content: Its a phone.. That's all you can say about it.. It calls.. sometimes.. It texts.. sometimes.. It gets calls.. sometimes.. It gets texts.. sometimes.. The back button and the browser button are shared so you spend half your time cancelling the browser.. It has no muted vibrate selection only.. You can't get any sort of protective case for it.. The querty keys are great but they replicate alot so you spend so much time correcting what you are sending.. The pictures and video do not like to transfer to any other object.. And.. the newest problem is this.. My rec'd texted messages somehow got switched into conversation view and now you can not change it back and you are unable to access your text messages or delete them.. You only have one chance to read it, but you have to be careful since the button to view double pushes alot.. And your phone can only hold so many texts before you can receive no more.. I will never buy and LG anything ever again..

Reviews.Title: IT's NO SMART PHONE
Reviews.Author: Dennis Sigmon
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife because she wanted a tracphone. It works like it should. I am just use to more of a smart phone (Iphone) but for her it works fine.

Reviews.Title: WIFI
Reviews.Author: Celeste Barlow
Reviews.Content: I like the phone but I hate tracfone.  I had tracfone for many years never had a problem.  When I went to transfer my nunber from old phone to new phone they lost my number.  After 6 hours on the phone and 3 sim cards later I gave up and took the second new number they gave me and vowed to never use tracfone again.  Their CS sucks. I am so mad about losing my old number and spending 6 hour on the phone with nothing to show for it.  I'm going to use my minutes up and move to another company.  Now one of these reviews (that I can't find) said that there was 3G wifi on this phone so I thought I could use free wifi and it doesn't work. Does anyone know how to do this?  Good Luck!

Reviews.Title: Didn't work right out of the box!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Michael Gazzara
Reviews.Content: I received the phone on Tuesday and charged it. It was supposed to be for my mother. I waited several days until I had the time to activate it. It wouldn't even turn on. I tried charging it again and still no luck. I spent time on the phone with tech support removing the battery and trying to turn it on, still nothing. I bought the phone to give to my mother and cancel her cell contract with another provider to save her some money. Now I have to wait to receive another phone. I hope I have better luck with this one.

Reviews.Title: Nice but...
Reviews.Author: Hgimd
Reviews.Content: Nice, but I don't like the fact that it locks every few seconds. I'm surprised that no one has commented on that. It's really annoying. Programmed it to lock after 60 seconds which was the most amount of time available. That's still to quick. I'm having to unlock it all the time. Yes, it's nice that it won't dial a number when it's in your purse or pocket. But in your hand? Would have been nice if it stayed unlocked until the user was finished and locked it themselves.

Reviews.Title: Virtually no internet service. Toggle scrolling is a pain. No mute button.
Reviews.Author: TheRealDeal
Reviews.Content: After reading numerous positive reviews of this item (with warnings about the heavy minutes deduction with browser use -- I only use my phone for the 'net occasionally, so that was acceptable), I ordered with confidence.  What a disaster this item is -- not typical of my experience with LG phones.First, the phone gobbles up minutes when the browser is open because it is slower than dial-up, pulls up windows that are too small to read w/o using Options to Zoom the page, and the toggle for page direction is inaccurate and prone to error. So, minutes go by with no positive outcome.Second, the phone uses a toggle button instead of arrows to navigate a page.  You press the top or bottom of the toggle to scroll up or down, and press the right or left side of the button to go laterally.  The equivalent of "enter" is the center of the toggle button. It is difficult to press the toggle exactly correctly in order to get the response you want, especially the "down" toggle -- frequently need to use my fingernail the press it in order not the have it read as "enter" and bring up a page I don't want.I've had much lower grade, simpler phones (including LG) with better internet access and visual display.  The toggle is annoying to the point that I consider this wasted money.Pros: keyboard is accurate, including the tiny number keys on the left (in spite of the drawback listed above.)I can set it to go directly to my email account of choice from the EMAIL menu key --nice.Cons:  Non-existent internet service.  Sloppy toggle button  Cannot set the phone to vibrate w/o having to toggle down the volume from maximum. There is no mute button

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: Sher
Reviews.Content: Well the phone was fine. The problem was even for an 11 yr old and triple min. Just wasn't enough. I found I was spending $60 plus and climing. So have to go another rought. So phone great for those that talk and text little. $20 gets you 180 mins which comes out to about 3 hrs.

Reviews.Title: I bought this phone because it had more features.
Reviews.Author: l stone
Reviews.Content: When I tried to activate I was told it didn't work in my area, they would send me a replacement.The replacement had less features, and when I called to get problem fixed I was put on hold over and over.They will not stand behind product. Don't buy you will just be throwing your money away.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: J. D. Laurin
Reviews.Content: As eager as I was to get this new Tracfone, I was greatly disappointed in the service area range. The coverage was very scetchy with this model.

Reviews.Title: Covers for LG 530G
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I bought the LG 530G but when I went back to the store to buy a protective cover, not a case, found it is not available for this phone. Even searched on-line and in many stores but to no avail: K-Mart, Kohls, Walmart, JC Penny, Sams.
